hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.php$'; then vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --quiet "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; echo 'formatted'; fi

[ -x vendor/bin/phpstan ] && vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --no-progress --error-format=raw 2>&1 | head -10 || true; [ -f strands_agents/api/server.py ] && python3 -m py_compile strands_agents/api/server.py 2>&1 || true; [ -f strands_agents/agents/__init__.py ] && python3 -m py_compile strands_agents/agents/__init__.py 2>&1 || true
